text: The women's coxless four competition at the 2019 World Rowing Championships took place at the Linz-Ottensheim regatta venue. A top-eight finish ensured qualification for the Tokyo Olympics. ==Schedule== The schedule was as follows: {| class="wikitable" ! Date ! Time ! Round |- | Sunday 25 August 2019 || 12:16 || Heats |- | Tuesday 27 August 2019 || 10:28 || Repechages |- | Thursday 29 August 2019 || 12:22 || Semifinals A/B |- | rowspan=3|Saturday 31 August 2019 || 10:30 || Final C |- | 12:12 || Final B |- | style=background:lemonchiffon| 14:58 ||style=background:lemonchiffon| Final A |} All times are Central European Summer Time (UTC+2) ==Results== ===Heats=== The two fastest boats in each heat advanced directly to the A/B semifinals. The remaining boats were sent to the repechages. ====Heat 1==== {|class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" !Rank !Rowers !Country !Time !Notes |-bgcolor=ccffcc | 1 | align="left"|Olympia Aldersey | 5 | align="left"|Kira Yuvchenko Elizaveta Kornienko Anna Aksenova Valentina Plaksina | align="left"| | 6:57.78 | R |} ===Repechages=== The three fastest boats in each repechage advanced to the A/B semifinals. The remaining boats were sent to the C final. ====Repechage 1==== {|class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" !Rank !Rowers !Country !Time !Notes |-bgcolor=ccffcc | 1 | align="left"|Wang Zifeng Xu Xingye Zhang Min Wang Fei | align="left"| | 6:33.49 | SA/B |-bgcolor=ccffcc | 2 | align="left"|Tara Hanlon Eimear Lambe Aifric Keogh Emily Hegarty | align="left"| | 6:35.14 | SA/B |-bgcolor=ccffcc | 3 | align="left"|Alessandra Montesano Valentina Iseppi Alessandra Patelli Sara Bertolasi | align="left"| | 6:37.20 | SA/B |- | 4 | align="left"|Kira Yuvchenko Elizaveta Kornienko Anna Aksenova Valentina Plaksina | align="left"| | 6:41.13 | FC |- | 5 | align="left"|Isabelle Hübener Juliane Faralisch Ida Kruse Alexandra Höffgen | align="left"| | 6:51.75 | FC |} ====Repechage 2==== {|class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" !Rank !Rowers !Country !Time !Notes |-bgcolor=ccffcc | 1 | align="left"|Davina Waddy Kelsi Walters Eve MacFarlane Phoebe Spoors | align="left"| | 6:34.78 | SA/B |-bgcolor=ccffcc | 2 | align="left"|Sara Parfett Emily Ford Polly Swann Holly Hill | align="left"| | 6:35.72 | SA/B |-bgcolor=ccffcc | 3 | align="left"|Madison Mailey Sydney Payne Jennifer Martins Stephanie Grauer | align="left"| | 6:37.63 | SA/B |- | 4 | align="left"|Diana Serebrianska Natalia Kovalova Kateryna Dudchenko Nataliya Dovhodko | align="left"| | 6:41.94 | FC |- | 5 | align="left"|Marcela Milošević Ivana Jurković Josipa Jurković Bruna Milinović | align="left"| | 6:42.20 | FC |} ===Semifinals=== The three fastest boats in each semi advanced to the A final.
